alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:54PM CDT until September 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gillespie County in south central Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 754 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Doss, or 19 miles south of Mason, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Doss. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
